name: Milk Man: Shit Edition: Better Edition
name_original: Milk Man: Shit Edition: Better Edition
description:
This is just Milk Man: Shit Edition (a game I made last year) but redone in the engine I'll be making MIlk Man 2 in. It runs a lot better than the original, and at 60 fps. It's pretty much a tech demo of the new engine.

Also it adds a few secrets and a bunch of terrible midis done by me. Most of the midis were made in January 2021.

Software I used to make this:

  • GameMaker: Studio 1.4 - game engine used for the original game
  • GameMaker 8.0 Pro - game engine used for this game
  • Audacity - audio recording
  • Cakewalk Pro Audio 9 - midi making
  • MS Paint - textures
